title: They Sold You Out! (Ep 1183)
description:
In this episode, I address the bombshell accusation by Attorney Alan Dershowitz about this liberal activist that will change the way you look at the Spygate scandal, and the Obama administration. I also address the ridiculous Obama tweet where he tries to take credit for the booming Trump economy. News Picks:Alan Dershowitz drops a bombshell about George Soros.

 

Michael Bloomberg’s biggest problem is himself. 

 

Did the Obama Stimulus plan work?

 

John Solomon blew the lid off of the George Soros scandal in 2019.

 

The fact whistleblower had some suspicious White House meetings. 

 

A Second Amendment win in Virginia, for now. 

 

Stay vigilant, the Virginia firearm confiscation law was tabled for a year. 

 

Social Security is a terrible investment. Here are the numbers. 

 

Copyright Dan Bongino All Rights Reserved.
